title: RETRACTED: A case report of a 4-year-old girl with neurofibromatosis type 1.
abstract: This article has been retracted: please see Elsevier Policy on Article Withdrawal (http://www.elsevier.com/locate/withdrawalpolicy). This article has been retracted at the request of the Authors. A diagnostic discordance in the original pathology reports has been noticed and requires further evaluation, therefore the paper will be retracted.
